content: i like this style beret that i have been making so i thought i would write up the pattern to share it s one of many style s i ve managed to come up with but time does not prevail to write them all to share slowly does it and i may have more patterns to post i have written this beret pattern with 2 set s of instruction s one being for a thicker yarn which is nice and warm for winter wear and the other is with a thinner yarn that can be worn for three season s
